title: How Too Many Trees Contribute To California's Drought
teaser: As California's historic drought drags on, just about everyone there is wishing the state had gotten more water this year. That's largely up to Mother Nature â€” through snow and rainfall. But it also depends on trees in the state's mountains, and the history of putting out every forest fire.
